p: Most of the COVID-19- infected cases will face mild to moderate respiratory illness and they will recover without requiring special therapies. Elders and those with underlying medical problems such as cardiovascular disease, chronic respiratory disease, diabetes, and cancer are more in danger to develop serious illnesses. At this time, there are no specific treatments or vaccines for COVID-19. However, many ongoing clinical trials are evaluating potential treatments. Herein, we investigated the typical treatments for COVID-19 including Home remedy, Herbal medicine, chemical drugs, plasma therapy, and also vaccines.
